title: Wrangell - St Elias National Park & Preserve: Copper Center Area
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Copper Center Area             Copper Center Area        The Copper Center Area is the location of the the Copper Center Visitor Center and park headquarters.  Click on the map for a larger image.        Copper Center Area This area is located along the Richardson and Edgerton Highways in the Copper River valley, just outside of the park's boundaries. It contains the Copper Center Visitor Center, views of the Wrangell Mountains, and numerous local attractions. To enter the park from here requires at least a one hour (one-way) drive.
